text:
"Kenapa kau bisa tau?????" [redacted_name] terkekeh.
"Sejujurnya aku hanya menebak, namun melihat reaksimu jadi aku benar yah, " Jim menghela nafas lantas mengangguk.
"Kau memang benar El, aku sempat bertanya apakah dia mencintaiku? Dan dia hanya terdiam, tanpa ada niat untuk menjawab, dan saat hari itu aku tau apa yang ada dalam isi hatinya, tapi meskipun aku tau, aku tetap tak bisa melepaskannya, aku sangat mencintainya Elgi " Jim berucap dengan pandang sendu.
"Hah... Jim terkadang mencintai seseorang itu bisa membuat kita melakukan hal gila, Jim dengar ini adalah keputusan yang kau pilih, jika sesuatu hal terjadi apa kau siap menjalani semuanya?" Jim terdiam sejenak, lantas ia memandang [redacted_name] sedikit aneh.
"Apa maksudmu?" Elgi terdiam sejenak
"Jim masa depan siapa yang tau, kita tidak akan tau apa yang akan terjadi esok hari dan selanjutnya, "
"Ahh kau benar Elgi tapi apapun yang terjadi Aku akan menerima resiko dimasa depan, aku mencintainya jadi tentu saja aku merima semua resiko " Elgi tersenyum menepuk bahu Jim.
trans:
"How did you know?????" [redacted_name] chuckled.
"Honestly, I was just guessing, but judging by your reaction, I can tell I was right," Jim sighed and nodded.
"You’re right, El. I did ask him if he loved me, and he just stayed silent, not even trying to answer. That day, I found out what was in his heart. But even knowing that, I still can’t let him go. I love him so much, Elgi," Jim said, his gaze wistful.
"Hah… Jim, sometimes loving someone can drive us to do crazy things. Just remember, this is your choice. If anything happens, are you ready to deal with it?" Jim paused, looking at [redacted_name] with a hint of surprise.
"What do you mean?" Elgi asked, momentarily silent."
"Jim, who knows what the future holds? We can't predict what will happen tomorrow or beyond."
"Ah, you're right, Elgi. But whatever happens, I'll accept the risks. I love him, so I’ll take on whatever comes my way," Elgi said, smiling as she patted Jim's shoulder.
